uId.title: UID
uId.description: 96-bit unique identifing number for each device. Can be used to identify multiple devices with the same name

deviceName.title: Device Name
deviceName.description: User assignable name for the device

profileId.title: Profile ID
profileId.description: Tracks changes to the device configuration across the editor and on-board. If a different value is retrieved compared to the previous stored value, it can be assumed that configuration changes were performed externally of the editor.

deviceSettings.title: Device Settings
deviceSettings.description: Device information which can be accessed via a CHCK command. READ ONLY
